title: Healey signs new offshore wind agreement with leaders of Nova Scotia as grid relies on fossil fuels
description: Gov. Maura Healey and Nova Scotia Premier Tim Houston signed an agreement to strengthen collaboration between the two jurisdictions on offshore wind development in the North Atlantic as the region’s electrical grid has been powered by fossil fuels during the...

title: How a Comox Valley fossil discovery forever changed paleontology in B.C.
description: In late autumn 1988, Richard Hebda — then head of botany at the Royal BC Museum — stepped into the living room of a man named Mike Trask following a report of an interesting fossil find on the Puntledge River.
